sentence: My priority is and has been since Day One is to do whatever it takes to defeat Brian Kemp who's cowardice nearly cost us our country,? Jones tweeted.
author: Max Greenwood
title: Vernon Jones drops bid for Georgia governor to run for Congress

author: Associated Press
title: Trump rescinds endorsement of Alabama Republican Mo Brooks in U.S. Senate race

sentence: What are you hearing?? he said of Perdue, the former senator, after saying it would be difficult to topple Republican Brian Kemp, whom he loathes.
title: Trump deflects blame for Jan. 6 silence, says he wanted to march to Capitol
